articles.author: Analysis by Brian Lowry, CNN
articles.title: 'Avengers: Endgame' premiered a year ago. A whole lot has changed since then - CNN
articles.description: The Marvel blockbuster premiered one year ago, on April 26, 2019, although just imagining people crowding into theaters, it surely feels a whole lot longer. The movie went on to amass $2.8 billion worldwide, surpassing the benchmark set by "Avatar."
articles.content: (CNN)With what felt like a snap, "Avengers: Endgame" shattered opening-weekend box-office records, earning $357 million in North America -- roughly $100 million more than its predecessor. The movie went on to amass $2.8 billion worldwide, surpassing the bench… [+3766 chars]
